column2: English
Training
Papa Bear, this is Alpha One. Objective One cleared. Wolsum bridge is open. Over.
Alpha Black to Papa Bear. We've taken objective number two, the town of Wolsum. Over.
Papa Bear, Alpha One here. We've taken the Castle hill, and found some scotch. Over.
Alpha One to Bravo flight. Requesting immediate extraction. Over.
Alpha team, get ready for a fast-rope insert. We're coming up on the LZ, looks cold. Bravo out.
Copy that, Alpha One. We're not very far, be there soon. Bravo out.
This is Bravo dustoff. We're right overhead. Get ready for extraction. Over.
Everyone on board? We're airborne. Heading home. Bravo out.
Papa Bear to Alpha Black. Roger that. Out.
Roger that, Alpha. Good work. Keep moving. Out. Papa Bear out.
Alpha, we copy you. Nicely done. HQ out.
Alpha team, excellent work out there. Nice to see you made it back. Mission accomplished. Out.
Dark Crown
Gross, Ranger, at Ummanz Airbase.
Start
Insert LZ
Extract LZ
Clear Bridge
Neutralize Wolsum
Clear Castle
